    EpiCompare

    Sera Choi

    my-vignette.Rmd

    Introduction

    Load package and example datasets. The two example peakfiles have been

    library(EpiCompare)
data("encode_H3K27ac")
data("CnT_H3K27ac")

    The two example peakfiles have been transformed into GRanges object. If your peak files are in BED format, simply use ChIPseeker::readPeakFile("/path/to/peak/file", as = "GRanges").

    EpiCompare(peakfile1 = encode_H3K27ac,
           peakfile1_name = "encode",
           peakfile2 = CnT_H3K27ac,
           peakfile2_name = "CUT&Tag",
           outpath = "./EpiCompare.html")
